pages.text: Tier three wit scepter focused on conjuration and amplification. Adds the modifiers $(l:amethyst_imbuement:modifiers/echoing)Echoing$() and $(l:amethyst_imbuement:modifiers/skillful)Skillful$() and the unique spell $(l:amethyst_imbuement:spell_book/resonate)Resonate$(). Can be augmented with tier three or lower spells. Culmination of the $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_resonance)Path of Resonance.$()$(br2)$(l)Mana:$() 1450
